snippet.title: Delverium Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2710040/Delverium?utm_source=yt

Explore a vast procedurally generated world in this survival sandbox adventure for 1-4 players. Gather resources, build shelters, tend your farm, recruit NPC's, craft items or take on high risk dungeon crawling as you delve into the unknown. Be warned: Only the most courageous hero can uncover the secrets to Delverium. Could this be you?

00:00 - INTRO
00:10 - BUILD
00:29 - FARM
00:47 - CRAFT
01:05 - EXPLORE
01:22 - FIGHT
01:42 - CO-OP
01:55 - OUTRO
